name: serp
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool serp_results.
Tool description: Get Search Engine Results with simple API (SERP API)
API description: Fetches search engine results using the given query and optional parameters.

query.description: The search query to be sent to the search engine.

proxy.description: The country to use as a proxy for the search. Defaults to 'US'.

max.description: The maximum number of search results to return. Defaults to 10.
